page.title: 20A LOCAL FOOTBALL CLUB
page.content: On Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday and Friday evenings I do football training at my club which is called Sherwin. My managers name is Mr. Lally. We have to run around the park and do exercises like star jumps and sit ups. Then we play a game of football. The Sherwin kit is purple and yellow. We are in a league with 14 other clubs. We have lost only 4 games this season against teams from around Derby. Usually 15 people go training at Sherwin. There are 6 teams in Sherwin for players of different ages. On Sunday you have to pay 50 pence to play in a league match. You have to bring your medical card and two photographs when you first join. By Keith Hoskins.
